item.aerobaticelytra.aerobatic_elytra_wi: Only Creative players can use it
aerobaticelytra.network.kick: Was kicked for sending too many invalid aerobatic flight packets
aerobaticelytra.recipe.trail.clears_trai:
Rockets without stars clear
the trail for their side
aerobaticelytra.jei.info.aerobatic_elytr: Press ⟨%s⟩ to change between flight modes
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.upgrad: Hold in the offhand and sneak-use ingredients to upgrade
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.dye:
Each wing can be dyed separately
Right click in a water cauldron to clear
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.banner:
A different pattern can be used in each wing
Right click in a water cauldron to clear
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.trail:
A different trail can be set for each of the 4 rockets
Different rocket stars result in different trail styles
Rockets with multiple stars result in a random mix
Beware that mixing many different colors is not the best idea
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.split:
Wings can be separated to be dyed with
different colors or banners
Only matching pairs of wings can be rejoined
The left wing will remain in the crafting table
while the right will be the recipe result
aerobaticelytra.jei.help.category.join:
Only wings with matching abilities,
enchantments, damage and other NBT
can be merged

commands.aerobaticelytra.error.no_elytra: None of the targets has an Aerobatic Elytra equipped
aerobaticelytra.config.server.item.undam: Prevent the Aerobatic Elytra item from suffering any damage
Propulsion range in§b m/s²§r
§7Can include negative values (propelling backwards)

§7Setting this too high (or low) without the
§7friction to compensate is§l not§7 a good idea
§7You have been warned

Propulsion when taking off in§b m/s²§r
§7In case you don't want to have to heat up
Multiplier for the gliding force (caused by the wings)

Friction applied when flying
§7Applied every tick

Friction caused by rotation
§7Is scaled by the strength of the rotation

Friction applied underwater to nerfed aquatic elytras
§7Only relevant with nerfing datapacks

Emulated inertia, probably not what you thought.
§7Rate to which every tick's speed is interpolated to
§7the previous tick's.
§7Setting higher than §30.5§7 is not very enjoyable.
§7Setting to §31§7 will disable any maneuverability.
Friction applied when flying without propulsion

Extra gravity applied when flying without propulsion
§7Can be negative (less gravity)

Braking (crouch flying) aids in landing
§7However, strong winds will drag players when braking
§7Flying while braking continuously can also
be used to create trail effects

Friction applied when braking
§7Should be lower than Base Friction

Max time allowed braking in§b seconds§r
§7Set to 0 to disable the limit

Extra gravity applied when braking in§b m/s²§r
§7Makes landing easier
Allow players to change flight mode in midair
Enable the normal elytra mode in Aerobatic Elytras
aerobaticelytra.config.server.fuel.usage:
In§b units/s§r
§7Scales linearly with the relative propulsion strength
§7Adds with the other usages

In§b units/s§r
§7Scales quadratically with the relative propulsion strength
§7Adds with the other usages

In§b units/s§r
§7Scales as a sqrt with the relative propulsion strength
§7Adds with the other usages
Applied to the regular usage when boosting
aerobaticelytra.config.server.weather:he: Enables rain and wind interferences when flying with bad weather
aerobaticelytra.config.server.weather.ig:
If false, players above the cloud level
won't be affected by weather
aerobaticelytra.config.server.weather.cl:
Y-level at which weather stops affecting players
§7By default, Minecraft clouds appear at Y=128
§7Has no effect if Ignore Cloud Level is true
aerobaticelytra.config.server.weather.ra:
Applied when raining
§7Is affected by the biome:
§7    Snow is §3×1.2§7 times stronger
§7    In dry biomes there's no rain

How much should the rain push players down in§b m/s²§r
§7Can be negative (pushes up)

How much should the wind at most blow players around in§b m/s²§r
§7Nearby players are pushed by the same wind
How much should the wind change direction at most in§b deg/s§r

How much should the wind at most deviate player trajectories in§b deg/s§r
§7Nearby players get deviated equally
aerobaticelytra.config.server.weather.st:
Adds to the Rain values during storms
§7Likewise, it's affected by the biome

How much should the rain push players down in§b m/s²§r
§7Can be negative (pushes up)
Adds to the rain value during storms

How much should the wind at most blow players around in§b m/s²§r
§7Nearby players are pushed by the same wind
§7Adds to the rain value during storms

How much should the wind change direction at most in§b deg/s§r
§7Adds to the rain value during storms

How much should the wind at most deviate player trajectories in§b deg/s§r
§7Nearby players get deviated equally
§7Adds to the rain value during storms
aerobaticelytra.config.server.network.di:
Disable the Elytra Movement Check for players flying with Aerobatic Elytra
§7This isn't necessary if the /gamerule already disables the check in general
aerobaticelytra.config.server.network.ae:
Custom Movement Check for players flying with Aerobatic Elytra
§7Default for regular elytra is§3 300§7, and§3 100§7 for non-flying players
§7Has no effect if the check is disabled above or with /gamerule

Tilt range checks overlook (as a multiplier)
§7The check takes in account both server and connection lag
aerobaticelytra.config.server.network.sp:
§6⚠ Changing this value won't make you go faster ⚠§r
§7This is a cap to prevent the world from crashing if you break the other settings
§7If you ever reach this cap, you'll be notified in the chat
aerobaticelytra.config.server.network.in:
Max number of allowed invalid flight packets per player
§7Exceeding this number grants a kick
§7Set to 0 to disable
Applied after the Collision Damage multiplier when colliding with hay bales

Soft-break leaves on impact
§7Broken leaves are non-solid and slow your flight, but grow again with time

Minimum required speed to break leaves
§7Setting this too low will make landing on trees harder

Fixed chance of breaking leaves on impact
§7Can be negative (subtracts to linear chance)

Chance of breaking leaves at§b 1m/s§r
§7Scales linearly with speed
Adds to the constant chance
Motion multiplier applied to entities inside broken leaves

Chance for broken leaves to regrow on each random tick
§7Redstone powered leaves or leaves colliding with entities won't regrow
Players flying into slime are bounced back

Minimum speed to bounce on slime
§7Setting this too low will make landing on slime harder
Friction applied to the tilt on each bounce
aerobaticelytra.config.client.controls.y: How fast do the strafing keys reach maximum yaw tilt
aerobaticelytra.config.client.controls.i: Invert Controls on Front Third Person
aerobaticelytra.config.client.lookaround:
You can look around while flying by pressing a configurable key
§7(Alt by default)

Mouse sensitivity when looking around.
§7Acts as a multiplier to the default mouse sensitivity

Maximum pitch (vertical) angle you can look around§3 in degrees§r.
§7It is recommended to keep this below 90°

Maximum yaw (horizontal) angle you can look around§3 in degrees§r.
§7It is recommended to keep this below 90°
Automatically look around while aiming a bow, if not already aiming

The look around angle can be made persistent (and reset) by double pressing the look around key
§7It is possible to preserve the angle after landing and taking off again by setting this option off.
aerobaticelytra.config.client.style.visu: Multiplies how much does the FOV increase when flying

Display a special crosshair when flying on first person,
which displays your current tilt on each axis

The Flight Bar shows your propulsion strength
§7You may choose to hide it, replace the XP bar when flying, or show it over the XP bar

How many seconds should the mode toast last
§7The toast appearance can be changed by resource packs
Horizontal toast position on screen in percentage
Vertical Toast position on screen in percentage

Even though the loom only allows you to
compose up to§b 6§r layers in banners, the game can
handle up to§b 16§r. Here you can expand that
limit exclusively for banners in Aerobatic Elytras
aerobaticelytra.config.client.style.visi: Where should the fuel be displayed

When should the fuel be displayed
§7The currently equipped elytra always shows it

Disable glint rendering in aerobatic elytra wings.
§7Helps see patterns in enchanted elytras

When should the enchantment glint display in the inventory
§7Helps see elytra colors
aerobaticelytra.config.client.style.dark:
Use darker textures in GUIs
This includes the JEI recipe boxes
If you use a dark theme resource pack, such as %s and %s, you may enable the dark theme to use darker textures in the mod GUIs as well

Detect automatically enabled resource packs with a name suggesting dark theme support
§7Currently, if you change resource packs mid-game the change might not be detected

RegEx pattern used to match dark
theme resource pack names
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound:help:
Control the volume of all mod sounds
§7Resource packs may alter these sounds
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound.wind: Affects the wind sound heard while flying
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound.rota:
Affects the wind sound heard while
quickly rotating in the air
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound.boos:
Affects the boost sounds, both when
accelerating and slowing down
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound.brak: Affects the wind sound heard while braking
aerobaticelytra.config.client.sound.whis: Affects the whistling sound heard while flying very fast
aerobaticelytra.config.text.datapack_tip:
Use datapacks for recipe and loot configuration. Example template datapacks come bundled with the mod
§7Try typing the command "%s§7" to get suggestions.
§7It's possible to replace the elytra found in end ships using a loot table.
aerobaticelytra.config.warning.speed_cap: Flying too fast!: %s m/s. Aerobatic Elytra config might be broken
